CustomField.formula:
IF(ISBLANK(Number_of_Student__c),'',
IF( Number_of_Student__c < 10 , 'Super Small Institute',
IF(Number_of_Student__c < 20 , 'Small Institute',
IF(Number_of_Student__c < 50 , 'Medium Size Institute',
IF(Number_of_Student__c < 100,'Large Size Institute' ,'Super Large Institutes')))))
CustomField.label: Student Type
